item.title: Savannah Guthrie's missing mom may have been abducted while she slept, sheriff says
item.description: Authorities in the Tucson, Arizona, area are searching for the mother of "Today" show host Savannah Guthrie, 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie.

item.title: Epstein survivor attorney: "Department of Justice doesn't care about victims one bit"

item.title: Immigration officers in Minneapolis will start wearing body cameras, Noem says
item.description: All federal immigration agents in Minneapolis will begin wearing body cameras, Secretary of Homeland Security Kristi Noem said Monday, a policy that c...

item.title: Survivors ask DOJ to take down Epstein files because of redaction failures
item.description: Some of the survivors of Jeffrey Epstein are calling for the Justice Department to take down the files it has released concerning the dead sex offende...

item.title: Man who had affair with au pair found guilty of murdering wife, another man
item.description: Brendan Banfield, who was having an affair with the family's Brazilian au pair, was found guilty on Monday of murdering his wife and another man.
